sentences.en: "Daring Adventures" from '86 is a far more cohesive and successful album.
sentences.cn: 1986年发行的《勇于冒险》是一张风格更为统一也更为成功的专辑。

sentences.en: a highly successful (= very successful ) meeting
Both had successful careers and the future looked bright.
sentences.cn: 两个人都事业有成，前程似锦。

sentences.en: Dennis had recently begun a successful career conducting opera.
sentences.cn: 丹尼斯最近开始从事歌剧指挥的工作，并且非常成功。

sentences.en: Even the successful flying boats proved, in the end, uneconomical.
sentences.cn: 即使是成功的水上飞机最终也未能盈利。

sentences.en: I am looking forward to a long and successful partnership with him.
sentences.cn: 我期盼着能与他建立长期而有成效的合作关系。

sentences.en: I wasn't successful, so they looked down on me.
sentences.cn: 我一无所成，所以他们瞧不起我。

sentences.en: In her younger days my mother had been a successful fashionwear saleswoman.
sentences.cn: 我妈妈年轻时曾经是个成功的时装销售员。

sentences.en: Life for the successful doctor can be emotionally and financially rewarding.
sentences.cn: 对于事业有成的医生来说，生活在精神和物质两方面都能令人满足。

sentences.en: Many successful women do not want to be pensioned off at 60.
sentences.cn: 很多成功女性不想60岁就领养老金退休。

sentences.en: One of the keys to successful business is careful planning.
sentences.cn: 打造成功企业的关键之一就是要精心策划。

sentences.en: Rafferty was the sole survivor from the successful Ireland team of 1988.
sentences.cn: 拉弗蒂是1988年红极一时的爱尔兰队硕果仅存的球员。

sentences.en: The South Pole expedition proved to be staggeringly successful.
sentences.cn: 这次南极探险结果非常成功。

sentences.en: Was he born to be successful, or did he just luck out?
sentences.cn: 是他命中注定会成功，还是仅仅交了好运？

sentences.en: We have been successful because we are offering a quality service.
sentences.cn: 我们因提供的服务水准一流一直经营得很成功。

sentences.en: We never close the door on a successful series.
sentences.cn: 我们从不把成功的系列节目拒之门外。

words.tran_cn: 成功，成就；胜利；大获成功的人或事物

trans.tran_en: achieving what you wanted, or having the effect or result you intended
